entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm except 4 cm near Fernie. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
